lines: Zioni Lili Kujulu, Munzi Mupya Ngwendiyanda,
Misamu mibotu Oko, Ila Micelo Minono,
Kulasalala Ngwa Oko, A buzuba Butamani
A Masi Mabotu Manji, Amazila A Golide.
A Misyini Mibotu ko Balamansene Mabotu,
Bala Masani Mabotu, Boonse Babotu Baya Ko.
Cuuno Cabwami Ca Leza, A zyuno Zili Ambali,
Kulyookezya Kubotu Ko, Munzi Mubotu Wa Mwami.
